text: If that fixes it, I would recommend adjusting your program so that you never have to do `global x`. It's slow and introduces dynamic dispatch where it's not needed. Instead, create a function, say `g(x)` (using `@everywhere` to create it on all workers), which contains the `@distributed` loop, and just call it on the head node as `y = g(x)`.
